tests.query: CREATE TABLE union1 ( date Date, a Int32, b Int32, c Int32, d Int32) ENGINE = MergeTree(date, (a, date), 8192);
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE union2 ( date Date, a Int32, b Int32, c Int32, d Int32) ENGINE = Distributed(test_shard_localhost, currentDatabase(), 'union1');
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE union3 ( date Date, a Int32, b Int32, c Int32, d Int32) ENGINE = Distributed(test_shard_localhost, currentDatabase(), 'union2');
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: select b, sum(c) from ( select a, b, sum(c) as c from union2 where a>1 group by a,b UNION ALL select a, b, sum(c) as c from union2 where b>1 group by a, b  order by a, b) as a group by b order by b;
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: select b, sum(c) from ( select a, b, sum(c) as c from union1 where a>1 group by a,b UNION ALL select a, b, sum(c) as c from union2 where b>1 group by a, b order by a, b) as a group by b order by b;
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: select b, sum(c) from ( select a, b, sum(c) as c from union1 where a>1 group by a,b UNION ALL select a, b, sum(c) as c from union1 where b>1 group by a, b order by a, b) as a group by b order by b;
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql

tests.query: select b, sum(c) from ( select a, b, sum(c) as c from union2 where a>1 group by a,b UNION ALL select a, b, sum(c) as c from union3 where b>1 group by a, b order by a, b) as a group by b order by b;
tests.name: 00506_union_distributed.sql
